title: Angvik 1.2 (roguelike)
description:
This is: Angvik 1.2 [DefenderArcade requested this!]

Expect to die in this platformer, no joke. That's where the roguelike elements come into play (the game isn't random, though)... unforgiving difficulty and only ONE LIFE! CHECK IT OUT IF YOU'RE INTERESTED IN DEATHHHHH!!!
